entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Report use-site error using ref field from type other than `ref struct` in C# #64682
  • Workspace reentrancy with SolutionCrawler and DiagnosticProvider #64681
  • Code folding does not work for anonymous objects #64679
  • Cursor is not changed to "normal" when over new rename UI panel #64677
  • New rename UI target token highlighting is a bit odd #64676
  • New rename UI stops updating the editor state when the textbox is fully cleared #64674
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.workspaces.workspacesnetcore.projectproperties (vs2022) #64672
  • Ref fields spec doesn't mention how scope flows from lambda to anonymous delegate types #64670
  • Variable names suggestion #64669
  • LSIF Go-to-definition does not work when aliases are involved #64665
    17.5
  • SourceGenerator: No defining declaration found for implementing declaration of partial method #64664
  • Clear build-only diagnostics in the error list for edited documents #64659
    17.5 P1
  • Roslyn/IDE: Add missing usings [multiple suggestions] #64657
  • Delegate type inference from a method group with using static. #64656
    17.5
  • IDE0055: does not provide any control on nested for/foreach/while statements #64654

Closed

  • StackOverflowException in code analyzer for simple class #64392
    17.5
  • No error reported assigning through ref local of ref struct type after ref assigning parameter #62618
    17.5
  • Ref fields spec on re-assignments can be simplified #64671
  • Obsolete-Attribute with interpolated string as message does not raise warnings #64605
    17.5
  • The generate method fix in VB generates a delegate param while AddressOf is not used #64631
  • C# async functions hold onto memory beyond lifetime of function #64607
  • Provide a Class Implementation for an Interface on (ctrl+.) #63874
    Backlog
  • Error when applying the IDE0059 rule on code with simplified 'new' expression #64291
    17.5 P1
  • Improve negation of relational patterns with numeric values in refactorings #64558
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update references to ref fields spec #64686
    Area-Compilers
  • Make titles for IDE0029 and IDE0030 unique #64685
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update M.CA.Testing version to 1.1.2-beta1.22512.1 #64684
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix crash in MetadataAsSource when opening loose (misc) files #64683
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • Scoped implicitly-typed lambda parameters #64680
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Create source texts for open buffers with the new default source hash algorithm #64668
    Area-IDE
  • Update VS Platform NuGet package version #64667
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Track local constant usage in attributes #64660
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Set val escape on expression variables (#64414) #64621
    Area-Compilers
  • Save CustomAttributesBag before post decoding well known attributes. #64649
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64678
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Revert "Implement IAttributeOperation (#59369)"" #64488
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Skip Workspace ProjectProperties integration test #64673
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix early attribute decoding when an argument is interpolated string #64612
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Make packed LSIF generator behave more like a tool. #64675
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve GenerateMethod for VB implicit call case #64635
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move to new image #64472
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Do not yield the UI thread between an undo unit being created and committed #64651
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Check value scopes match in ref reassignment #64561
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64666
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Handle implicit object creation in remove unused values code fixer #64662
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update DefiniteAssignment Pass to Account for Local Default Parameter Values #63850
    Area-Compilers
  • Change operator when negating relational patterns with numeric values #64594
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64655
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use the source-built version of ref packs and don't use app host when building in source-build. #64650
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Load CompletionProvider from references in background" #64648
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64653
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64687
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Speculative semantic model - create child member models for attributes and parameter default values. #64634
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic snippets - constructor snippet #64489
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Expand IOperation check to lambdas #64630
    Area-Compilers
  • Make IPreviewService async #63661
    Area-IDE
  • Remove exportProvider parameter from TestWorkspace ctor #64221
    Area-IDE
  • Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace #64644
    Area-IDE
  • Support generated-only symbols in SymbolFinder #63377
    Area-IDE
  • Fix nullable walker cycle #64600
    Area-Compilers
  • Caller of an async local function cannot expect any of the callee’s code to execute #64482
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not use CWT for Task<Compilation> #64623
    Area-IDE
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64613
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in NavigateTo OOP calls. #64576
    Area-IDE
  • VB ConvertTupleToStruct should not include NullableAttributes in it #64647
    Area-IDE
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers, Blocked
  • Extend test coverage for lambda default parameters #64530
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for Suppression/Configuration fixes for build-only diagno… #63835
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Test flaky tests #64617
    Area-IDE
  • Respond to missed feedback #64513
    Area-IDE
